version_description: * Updates to support iPhone 5 screen layout
Added the ability to launch the desktop version of the site.
Updated search result message to make it more clear that a district must activate Skyward Mobile Access for it to appear in the search results.

The school district search option now lists all districts. To continue setting up your connection and have access to your information your school district must enable the Skyward Mobile Access feature.

Connection setup improvements.

Updated App icons.

Login Improvements.

If you have questions, problems, or suggestions please send them to appsupport@skyward.com
Support for iPhone 6 and 6 plus resolutions.
iOS Improvements

* You can now customize how often a passcode is required when entering the app. Either immediately every time or after a certain amount of time has passed since you were last in the app.
* Support for secure logout from mobile site
* Faster login routine is used when available

iOS 9 support!
- Multitasking on iPads
- Quick actions for 3D touch enabled devices to add or launch accounts

Also:
- If you only have one account we'll take you there right away after entering your pin instead of making you pick it.

iOS 9 support!
- Multitasking on iPads
- Quick actions for 3D touch enabled devices to add or launch accounts

Also:
- If you only have one account we'll take you there right away after entering your pin instead of making you pick it.

It's finally here, Skyward now supports sending push notifications!
- Push notifications are available for districts using the New Mobile Beta if configured/enabled
- Notifications for Low Food Service Balance, Requisitions, and Time Sheet Approvals are available now
- Notifications for Graded/Missing Assignments will be available in June
- More types of notifications will become available in the future

Touch ID is now allowed by default to unlock the app. This may be disabled in settings.
